contest-event.event-date:
June 22, 1907 D Hamilton Contest
Hamilton Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
hamilton-contest
None
Palace Grounds, Hamilton, Lanarkshire, Scotland, UK 1st prize £12 and cup, 2nd prize £10, 3rd prize £7, 4th prize £5 divided between Douglas Colliery and Wishaw. March contest 1st (£2) Milnwood, 2nd (£1) Coltness. 7 bands competed.
March 23, 2012, 6:42 p.m. Sept. 19, 2018, 11:08 a.m.
1 Newmains Edward Sutton Selection from Weber [arr. Round]
2 Milnwood 2nd L.R.E John McCubbrey Meyerbeer [arr. Round]
3 Shotts Foundry John Radcliffe Rossini [arr. Round]
4 Wishaw Steel Works Jack Remington Recollections of Balfe
4 Douglas Colliery John McCubbrey Tannhäuser [unknown arranger]
Unknown Result Motherwell Town Albert Wharmby Joan of Arc [Round]
Unknown Result Shotts St Patrick's Brass John Radcliffe L'Etoile du Nord [unknown arranger]
